info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 4 at 11:19AM EDT until May 5 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Peachtree City GA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...
Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton affecting Whitfield County.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Coahulla Creek at Keiths Mill Road near Dalton.
* WHEN...From this morning to late tonight.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding begins. Pasture and fields upstream...right and left bank from the Keiths Mill Road bridge... and downstream on the left bank begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EDT Sunday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 11:00 AM EDT Sunday was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this evening and continue falling to 6.5 feet early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.4 feet on 08/19/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO LATE TONIGHT
